channel.title: Notice board | Università degli Studi di Milano Statale

item.title: Summer closure
item.description: The University will be closed 15-21 August for summer holiday.

item.title: University closure - InformaStudenti
item.description: The University will be closed until 21st August. It will be possible to submit requests and book appointments on the InformaStudenti platform again from 9:00 am on 22 August.

item.title: Carreer services suspension – August 2022
item.description:
Telephone and email services of the Graduate Career Guidance and Placement Office are suspended from the 8th to the 19th of August. The office will reopen on Monday, 22 August.
It is possible to update your CV and apply for job or internship offers during the period of closure (8–21 August).

item.title: National doctoral programmes at partner universities
item.description: Consult the Italian national doctoral programme announcements from universities partnering with the University of Milan.

item.title: Science and Technology Academic Office closure
item.description: The Academic Office of the Faculty of Science and Technology will be close from August 8, 2022 until August 26, 2022.

item.title: Agricultural and Food Sciences - Academic Office closure
item.description: The Academic Office of the Faculty of Agricultural and Food Sciences will be close from August 8, 2022 until August 19, 2022.

item.title: Pharmacy Academic Office closure
item.description: The Academic Office of the Faculty of Pharmacy will be close from August 16, 2022 until August 26, 2022.

item.title: Calls for research awards
item.description:
The Carlo Erba Foundation, in collaboration with KEDRION, announces the prizes:
˙ Cecilia Cioffrese
˙ Guelfo Marcucci
˙ Fabrizio Fabbrizzi

reserved for graduates in Medicine and Surgery, Biological Sciences, Pharmacy, Pharmaceutical Chemistry and Technology, Chemistry and other biomedical disciplines.
Calls are available at Study Awards section.

item.title: Giulio Andreolli Award “Fare Paesaggio”
item.description:
The Landscape Observatory of the Autonomous Province of Trento has established the Giulio Andreolli Triennial Award “Fare Paesaggio” to support the protection and management of the Alpine landscape.
The deadline for submitting applications is 30 September 2022.
Notice and information are available in the Study Awards section

item.title: Summer closure of SPES Faculty offices
item.description:
Please be informed that the Faculty of Economic, Political and Social Sciences will be closed on the following days:
- 6 to 20 August
- 27 August
The Faculty will be open 1 to 5 August and 22 to 26 August, from 8 am to 5 pm.

item.title: Disability and Sld Services suspension - August 2022
item.description:
Cosp - Disability and Sld Services will be available until Friday 5 August 2022.
Services will resume regularly on Monday 22 August.
Phone and mail support services will be suspended from 8 to 19 August.

item.title: Special advanced english/anglo-american/basic and advanced french/ basic and advanced spanish/basic and advanced german test session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the winter session
item.description: The SLAM Centre is running a special advanced English/Anglo-American/basic and advanced French/ basic and advanced Spanish/basic and advanced German test session dedicated to soon-to-be graduates in the Autumn session. The test is being held in person in room 700, 46, G. Colombo street – Milan - on 2nd November 2022.
